```{r}
Fib <- function(n){
  if (n<=2){
    print("Cannot input this number")
  }
  else{
    fib <- c(0,1)
    for (i in 3:n){
      fib[i] <- fib[i-2]+fib[i-1]
    }
    return (fib)
  }

}
Fib(7)
Fib(10)

Fib(0)
Fib(-1)

cos(1:10)

arr <- cos(1:90)
arr <- abs(arr - (-0.653))
arr[arr<0.001]



```
```{r}





find_cos_integer <- function(x){
  if (x<-1 | x>1){
    print("Uh oh")
  }
  k <- 0
  while (abs(cos(k)-x) > 0.001){
    k <- k+1
  }
  return (k)
}
  


find_cos_integer(0.1)
```
